data.title: Columbia SCX6346 – Pink Floyd
data.meta_description: "Soundtrack From The Film 'More'" 1969    Sleeve notes: Laminated flipback sleeve designed by Hipgnosis. Printed by Garrod & Lofthouse with a date code of 6907 (July 1967). Note the green tint to the back cover photo (later copies are black) and the couple are on the right hand side of the sleeve looking left…
data.text:
“Soundtrack From The Film ‘More'” 1969

Sleeve notes:

Laminated flipback sleeve designed by Hipgnosis. Printed by Garrod & Lofthouse with a date code of 6907 (July 1967). Note the green tint to the back cover photo (later copies are black) and the couple are on the right hand side of the sleeve looking left (also known as ‘west-facing’), later copies have the image reversed so they are facing the opposite way. Later sleeves also do not have the flip back type sleeve.

Label notes:

1st pressing has the following:

“MADE IN GT. BRITAIN • SOLD IN UK SUBJECT TO RESALE PRICE CONDITIONS, SEE PRICE LISTS” at the base of the label.

“THE GRAMOPHONE CO. LTD” around the label rim text on the left hand side.

One EMI boxed logo at the base of the label.

2nd pressing has the following:

“MADE IN GT. BRITAIN” at the base of the label.

“THE GRAMOPHONE CO. LTD” around the label rim text on the left hand side.

One EMI boxed logo at the base of the label.

3rd pressing (bottom left image) has the following:

“MADE IN GT. BRITAIN” at the base of the label.

“THE GRAMOPHONE CO. LTD” around the label rim text on the left hand side.

Two EMI boxed logos, one at the top of the label and another at the base.

4th pressing (bottom right image) has the following:

“MADE IN GT. BRITAIN” is now on the right hand side of the label perimeter text.

“EMI RECORDS LTD” around the label rim text on the left hand side.

Two EMI boxed logos, one at the top of the label and another at the base.
